intro: Sagraea bonplandii, commonly known as the Bonpland's sagraea, is a flowering plant native to the Andean region of South America. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in cloud forests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
